entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0195.10627] us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfConvertibleSecurities has a value of -85,805,000 and has been used with a retained earnings member. This element should not have a value when used with a retained earnings member. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly or if a different element or member should be used.
This rule will not report an error if the Retained Earnings value is less than 10% of the total impacting shareholders equity. The total compared to determine materiality is 10% of 594,045,000 or 59,404,500.
The properties of this us-gaap:StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOfConvertibleSecurities fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:RetainedEarningsMember Unit : USD Rule Element Id:10627 Rule version: 26.0.0RC2 - hayw-20221231.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
